h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell
content: As you head down the path from the Shrine, you’ll come upon a lone Snake Patroller harassing a fellow monkey who is hanging from the branches above. Teach the snake a lesson by dodging his lunging bite and then finishing him off. Doing so will award you a lot of loot, including the ‘’’Gall Gem’’’, which you’ll learn more about very soon.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell' and the sub-subsection 'Marsh of the White Mist'.
The content is as follows:
As you head down the path from the Shrine, you’ll come upon a lone Snake Patroller harassing a fellow monkey who is hanging from the branches above. Teach the snake a lesson by dodging his lunging bite and then finishing him off. Doing so will award you a lot of loot, including the ‘’’Gall Gem’’’, which you’ll learn more about very soon.
